title: Recent experience with this game.
body: I'm the guy that hates on this game yet still plays it. But recently I came across another thing this pathetic game has wrong with it. Long story short, Flexing with 2 others (3 in total). Get into lobby, get into queue, come load screen, player 3 cannot load in, states has internet issues, we are all on same internet.. impossible, tries and tries and cannot load in, can log in fine but can't load into the match that was currently going, meanwhile in game, comes 3 minutes and we cannot remake stating that no one is disconnected. Loss of LP. Thanks Rito. Another thing you guys seem to struggle with. Maybe it's just me that gets this bad luck with League. either way, shit company, shit game.

replies.body: It is a bit like that isn't it.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
